extendedInfo.description: The easiest way to take notes on Android tablets â Quick to add and edit â Quick to access ~ One-click to access your notes â Quick to search ~ Instant search for all notes ãComing soonãâ Sync to cloud and access your notes anywhere ãComing soonã

reviews.title: Needs sync
reviews.comment: It works great as a notepad but i need it to be syncable with the web version of this because this is my favourite notepad app even on the web.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A good start
reviews.comment: I really like the app, but its very limited until the sync functionality is release as an update (coming soon apparently). Looking forward to it linking up with the Chrome web app! Sure to be 5* with sync.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks abandoned use their other app Power Note instead
reviews.comment: Exceedingly poor no sync, even the Mac OS-X has the feature. Use their much more capable Power Note instead if it is compatible with you device.
reviews.author: David Brazendale

reviews.title: Simple, easy but........
reviews.comment: Feel a bit bad about only giving 2 stars, because I like this app, a lot. I have the google chrome add-on, I have the mac desktop version, they both sync beautifully. I also have the app on my phone, but because it doesn\'t sync, it is almost pointless. I understand a sync version is on the horizon, when it lands, I will probably give 5 stars.
reviews.author: Richard Mann

reviews.title: Needs Syn & Keeps Crashing
reviews.comment: Just installed it on my xperia pro as I saw that I could get it on Chrome, but notes on the mobile can\'t sync with the desktop version & I can\'t see notes I\'ve made in the desktop version on the fone. Can\'t seem to import notes from elsewhere, crashes almost as soon as I open it & try to do something (uninstalled & reinstalled) .... seems I will have to continue on with Color Note because Quick Note makes no sense right now
reviews.author: Bjoux Greene

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.comment: Locked up multiple times, trying to uninstall but keeps freezing
reviews.author: Dee Bryant

reviews.title: So so so so good. But!
reviews.comment: It crashes time to time idk why. Overall its very quick n easy. Opens up just like that.
reviews.author: justin ha

reviews.title: What is it with the pricing on some apps???
reviews.comment: Reinvented Windows Notepad with sync and prettier interface. Worth $40/year?  The only reason I didn\'t give this a one-star rating was because the developer seems to making some effort to make notes easily accessible offline and compatible with other apps.  Come on, folks... get a grip. I wouldn\'t even pay $45/year for Evernote, which is light years ahead of this app (but worse about user lock-in).
reviews.author: W.M. Hinsch

reviews.title: Sync on google
reviews.comment: Interface and use are perfect. It needs sync across multiple devices ASAP.
reviews.author: Adam Walker

reviews.title: Fine app but needs some improvement
reviews.comment: Pls add syncronization feature with the desktop verson.
reviews.author: Leonid Mironov

reviews.title: Great app,  with one major problem!
reviews.comment: Why I can\'t Sync from my phone???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Usless without the ability to sync app will be deleted
reviews.author: Patrick Gillespie

reviews.title: no sync...which is useless....
reviews.comment: no sync...which is useless.... 5 star if you sync with desktop.... rating is zero since no sync...if there was sync rating would be 5
reviews.author: Fleming Joe

reviews.title: no sync no good
reviews.comment: love the chrome web app.. no android tablet support
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice !!!
reviews.comment: Finally found what I want on my tablet. Tried many note apps but this one is near what I want.  Hope it can backup or sync! More pretty~~~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Vince
reviews.comment: This is a great app to help me keep important things organized.  However, sync would be very, very helpful.
reviews.author: Vince Ninemire

reviews.title: Update please
reviews.comment: This would be a great app if they would just fix the basics. I like using the Chrome version, but why won\'t this sync with it? The app description states that that is coming soon, but it hasn\'t been updated since March \'11. It looks like they have retired? App crashes when trying to add account info. Does anyone have a good substitute that has a companion Chrome app that syncs?
reviews.author: Brian Kelly
